name: Infra Arcana
summary: Infra Arcana is a coffee-break Roguelike by Martin Tornqvist. It incorporates thematic elements and characters from H.P. Lovecraft's stories and features a sanity system. As the player descends the catacombs of The Cult of Starry Wisdom in search of The Shining Trapezohedron and beholds the gruesome monstrosities and arcane horrors within, they risk bearing the mental consequences of what they have witnessed.
